entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 2 except minus 8 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2 except minus 8 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
